languages.text: {n}The Drukhari's blades ring out as they fly from their sheaths.{/n} "Give me a target!"

{n}玛拉斋利刃出鞘，发出一声清越的鸣响。{/n}“告诉我，要杀谁！”

languages.text: {n}Las espadas del drukhari tintinean al deslizarse de sus vainas.{/n} «¡Dame un objetivo!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's blades ring out as they fly from their sheaths.{/n} "Give me a target!"

languages.text: {n}Les lames du Drukhari sifflent en sortant de leur fourreau.{/n} « Indiquez-moi ma cible ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Klingen des Drukhari rasseln, als er sie aus ihren Scheiden zieht.{/n} "Gebt mir einen Namen!"

languages.text: {n}鞘から抜き放たれたデュカーリの刃が鳴り響く。{/n}「獲物を寄越せ！」

languages.text: {n}Drukhari'nin bıçakları, kınlarından uçarcasına çıkarken çınlıyor.{/n} "Bana bir hedef göster!"
